product_overview.description: ServerMint is a desktop application for managing game servers, built with Vue.js and Tauri. It provides a comprehensive interface for server management, mod installation, backup systems, and more.

core_features.name: Server Management
core_features.description: Create, start, stop, and manage game servers
acceptance_criteria: Users can create new servers with custom configurations
Users can start and stop servers
Users can view server status and information
Users can manage multiple servers simultaneously

core_features.name: Mod Management
core_features.description: Install and manage mods and modpacks
acceptance_criteria: Users can install mods from files

core_features.name: Backup System
acceptance_criteria: Users can create backups of servers

core_features.name: Global Command Palette
acceptance_criteria: Users can open command palette with keyboard shortcut
Users can access all major features

performance: Server operations should complete within reasonable time
usability: Interface should be intuitive and easy to navigate
Dark theme with green accents should be consistent
All features should be accessible via sidebar navigation
Responsive design should work on different screen sizes

user_stories.title: Server Creation
user_stories.description: As a server administrator, I want to create new game servers so that I can host different game types
acceptance_criteria: I can specify server name and type
I can start the server after creation

user_stories.title: Mod Installation
user_stories.description: As a server administrator, I want to install mods so that I can enhance my game servers

user_stories.title: Backup Management
user_stories.description: As a server administrator, I want to create backups so that I can protect my server data
acceptance_criteria: I can create backups of servers

user_stories.title: Quick Access
user_stories.description: As a user, I want quick access to all features so that I can work efficiently
acceptance_criteria: I can use the command palette
I can access all major functions

architecture.communication: Tauri commands between frontend and backend
